title: The Guardian
description: This is the first book in The Guardian TrilogyMoving to a small Scandinavian town feels like the worst kind of punishment, until Salma brushes shoulders with beautiful winged beings determined to change the course of her life.What starts as a harmless encounter turns into a battle for survival when the beautiful creatures reveal their true nature. Salma quickly learns that there’s a worse fate than death, and just how much she’s obligated to sacrifice for a cause that oughtn’t to be hers in the first place.
author: Carol A. Robi
